comment: /**  * Style a {@code toString()}'ed object before its fields are styled.  * @param buffer the buffer to print to  * @param obj the object to style  */
code: /**  * Style a {@code toString()}'ed object before its fields are styled.  * @param buffer the buffer to print to  * @param obj the object to style  */ void styleStart(StringBuilder buffer, Object obj).

comment: /**  * Style a {@code toString()}'ed object after it's fields are styled.  * @param buffer the buffer to print to  * @param obj the object to style  */
code: /**  * Style a {@code toString()}'ed object after it's fields are styled.  * @param buffer the buffer to print to  * @param obj the object to style  */ void styleEnd(StringBuilder buffer, Object obj).

comment: /**  * Style a field value as a string.  * @param buffer the buffer to print to  * @param fieldName the he name of the field  * @param value the field value  */
code: /**  * Style a field value as a string.  * @param buffer the buffer to print to  * @param fieldName the he name of the field  * @param value the field value  */ void styleField(StringBuilder buffer, String fieldName, @Nullable Object value).

comment: /**  * Style the given value.  * @param buffer the buffer to print to  * @param value the field value  */
code: /**  * Style the given value.  * @param buffer the buffer to print to  * @param value the field value  */ void styleValue(StringBuilder buffer, Object value).

comment: /**  * Style the field separator.  * @param buffer buffer to print to  */
code: /**  * Style the field separator.  * @param buffer buffer to print to  */ void styleFieldSeparator(StringBuilder buffer).
